item.title: Command Line for beginners - Email
item.description: There are a vast number of mail clients available to choose from for our everyday usage. But as Michael Elkins said, all mail clients suck. So there must be some way we could make one of those suckers suck less. Most mail clients are GUI based. But I am going to talk about command line mail clients, and specifically about mutt, because this one sucks less, and thatâ€™s what I use.
